questions.quote: Naw, that's probably just a dead body son. You see when the mob kills someone they through the body in the river.
I'm gonna count to three. If you don't give up the chair, the wig is coming off.
Also endowed. George... I know how much Susan meant to you. It can't be easy.
You ditched me. That's twice. Now I demand to know what's going on!
Listen, sweetheart, let me tell you a little something about guts.  This is guts.
He has this power over me, okay. I mean he has this way of manipulating every little word that I say. He's like a Svenjolly.
You can do better than me. You could throw a dart out the window and hit someone better than me. I'm no good!
He didn't come within two feet of the thing. He's wavin at it... So, I told him if he picks us up at the airport, he wouldn't have to pay me anything.
Peterman here. What? Oh no. Alright, I'll be right there.  It's my mother; she's at death's door. I just pray to God we can make it there in time.
If only he could have been cheating on his wife, you know, things would have been so much simpler.
